name: Bales of Amber
description:
Welcome to the end of the world. In this Kafka-esque dystopia, the government has gathered all remaining animals in order to form the Animal Factorization Initiative. Now you live in an apartment inside a whale. 

This surrealist seascape creates an opportunity to be an intimate part of the ecosystem you live in in a way that you never have been before.

What have you done?
